Articles.Content:
I may have access, thru various contacts, to a rather fancy 3D printer.  The fact that it resides at a prominent university and costs are gov funded are also a big plus.   

I'm told if I can get my craft file into a .sti format.  I can print it.  I figure is to maybe load craft into Unity?   ...but not sure what's been done in terms of a plug-in that would accept a .craft file.   

On the other hand, I've seen pics of people holding what appear to be KSP printed craft, so I know there must be some way....
